reporter_caption.center: STATE EX REL. CELESTINE v. PHELPS, 498 So.2d 19 (La. 1986)

caption.center: STATE EX REL. PETER CELESTINE v. C. PAUL PHELPS, D.O.C.

opinion.posture: In re Celestine, Peter; applying for remedial writ; Parish of Livingston, 21st Judicial District Court, Div. "B", No. 424460.
opinion.opinion_text: [1] Denied. Relator should file his motion in the 19th Judicial District Court. See R.S. 15:571.15.
